main event: A bright object was observed descending in O'Fallon, Illinois, on 5 December 1957, breaking into parts after about 2 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported as very bright and white in color., Observers compared its shape to an unsharpened pencil., Three small burning parts broke off from the object during its descent., The sighting occurred under clear, cold, and frosty weather conditions., Witnesses were so astonished they turned their vehicles around to investigate but found no evidence.
witness description: A housewife from O'Fallon, Illinois, considered reliable.
